text: Mohammad Reyshahri (), also known as Mohammad Mohammadi-Nik, (29 October 1946 â€“ 22 March 2022), was an Iranian politician and cleric. He was the first Minister of Intelligence from 1984 to 1989 in the cabinet of Prime Minister Mir-Hossein Mousavi. Reyshahri was Prosecutor-General of Iran from 1991 until 1993. He was also a Member of the Assembly of Experts from 2016 until his death. Reyshahri was born in Rey, Iran. Reyshahri died on 22 March 2022 in Tehran, Iran at the age of 75.Senior Iranian Cleric Ayatollah Reyshahri Passes Away ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Iranian politicians
title: Mohammad Reyshahri
